steps.title: Enemy at the Gate - Get Cobra Lash
steps.description: Get Cobra Lash reward from quest completion

reward.name: Cobra Lash
reward.usage_notes: Good for poison builds, projectiles chain between enemies.

steps.gear_focus: Look for claws or daggers with green sockets

steps.title: Mercy Mission - Get Chance to Poison
steps.description: Get Chance to Poison and purchase Explosive Trap

reward.name: Chance to Poison
reward.usage_notes: Obvious first link for poison builds. Essential for applying poison.

vendor.name: Explosive Trap
vendor.usage_notes: Excellent early single target. Place traps for burst damage.

steps.title: The Caged Brute - Get Whirling Blades

reward.name: Whirling Blades
reward.usage_notes: Movement with daggers/claws. Primary mobility skill.

steps.gear_focus: Look for dual wielding setup - dagger and claw

steps.title: The Siren's Cadence - Get Poisonous Concoction
steps.description: Get Poisonous Concoction option for poison build

reward.name: Poisonous Concoction
reward.usage_notes: Main Skill option. Requires empty main hand. Scales with Life Flask charges.

steps.gear_focus: Choose between weapons (Cobra Lash) or shield (Poisonous Concoction)

steps.title: Sharp and Cruel - Get Void Manipulation

reward.name: Void Manipulation
reward.usage_notes: Core chaos/poison support. MORE chaos damage multiplier.

steps.gear_focus: Continue looking for life and resistance gear

steps.title: Through Sacred Ground - Get Withering Step

reward.name: Withering Step
reward.usage_notes: Apply Withered debuff to enemies, increasing chaos damage taken.

steps.title: Intruders in Black - Get Herald of Agony
steps.description: Get Herald of Agony poison aura

reward.name: Herald of Agony
reward.usage_notes: Poison aura. Grants MORE damage with poison and increased poison chance.

steps.title: Lost in Love - Get Plague Bearer

reward.name: Plague Bearer
reward.usage_notes: Store poison damage for AoE clear. Toggle to release stored damage.

steps.title: Sever the Right Hand - Get Bladefall/Blade Blast
steps.description: Get physical spell combo for single target

reward.name: Bladefall
reward.usage_notes: Strong physical spell. Use with Blade Blast for massive damage combo.

vendor.name: Blade Blast
vendor.usage_notes: Detonates Bladefall blades for huge AoE damage. Cast after Bladefall.

steps.gear_focus: Look for spell damage and cast speed
